message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking $150 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Can you meet me there?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $110 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $135. It's a fair price for a product of this quality.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $135 is still a bit out of my budget. Can you consider $125?
